Integrating razorpay into your webapp
Mar 24, 2019
  • Javascript
  • NodeJS

const Razorpay = require('razorpay');

let rzp = Razorpay({
	key_id: 'KEY_ID',
	secret: 'name'
});

// capture request
rzp.capture(payment_id, cost)
	.then(function (data) {
		return 2;
	})
